problem.markdown:
1. WEDM is used for ( ) Die sinking operation ( ) Pocketing operation (x) Cutting operation ( ) For machining electrically non conductive material
2. The tool is of the form ( ) Shape of the job (x) Wire ( ) Solid rod ( ) Disc
3. Cutting of very hard electrically conductive material in EDM ,can be performed using ( ) Wire ( ) Metallic Ribbon ( ) Thin metallic softened discs (x) All of the above
4. The dielectric fluid used in wire EDM, is generally ( ) Kerosene ( ) Water + Kerosene (x) Water (De-ionized) ( ) Inert gas
5. CNC wire EDM, are generally ( ) 2 axis (x) 3 axis ( ) 4 axis ( ) All of the above

choicegroup.choice: For machining electrically non conductive material
